content:
any参数使用范例：

进入任意异常状态时，HP回复1%

[if]
 
[cooltime]
5000
[my active status on]
'any'
[/if]
 
[then]
 
[target]
'myself' -1
[restore]
'hp' '%' 1 0
[/then]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

any参数使用范例：


[then]

[target]
`enemy`
-1
[duration]
7000
[probability]
3
[active status]
`any`
25
[/then]
